review: works like a chRm, nice for people without cable
author: Monica Yurick

review: I've had a chromecast for over a year now and I've loved it. I mainly use it with apps on my phone. It's very easy to just cast what im watching up to the screen. The one downside is that it is quite difficult to mirror screen if your screen has video on it. The quality can be damaged if you don't actually use something that has chromecast support. It's gaining more and more support as time passes (netflix, hbo go, starz play, youtube), and it works quite well with each of these services.The setup is super easy and you can be up and streaming on your chromecast in less than ten minutes.Overall, it's an excellent streaming stick. You may not like it as much if you prefer to be able to use a universal remote to control everything, but other than  this, it's great. It's cheaper than the ROKU stick and does most of the major services as well. It's a nice thing to have on hand if you just want a simple way to stream.
author: James Smithe

review: The product is what I have expected to be. I like it very much however I do not use it each day. But it has enabled my simple HDTV to be an web enabled TV. I was simple and easy to install. I have not reach the full potential of the product yet because I'm still experimenting what it can do.The product was delivered in time and was in good shape. The seller did for sure good. So I recommend others to buy this product cause it's sure a keeper.
author: Carlos

review: Does everything its supposed to do. No problems at all. Love being able to cast my screen and watch cable tv shows and movies! Have one for each tv in the house, highly recommended.
author: Mark Davis

review: Can't neat the overall quality and wide range of uses.  Best Google deal out there.
